subject: Horse Racing
Accidents and Safety
Kentucky Derby
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Eight Belles (Race Horse)
Big Brown (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Neither the death of Barbaro nor the on-track euthanization of the filly Eight Belles prompted meaningful and uniform safety and medication rules.
snippet: Neither the death of Barbaro nor the on-track euthanization of the filly Eight Belles prompted meaningful and uniform safety and medication rules.
